function EP01_16()

    -- .エピローグ「もう一人の姫」
    SaveData.Title = "もう一人の姫"

    --吉　時間経過を出すため、空とかに一度逃げたい
    -- //BG：食堂
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[The cafeteria at Yuriai Private Academy after the entrance ceremony.
入学式を終えた百合愛学園の食堂。]])

    MSG([[Students who became close after the entrance ceremony split into several groups, chatting idly while having light snacks.
入学式後に親しくなった生徒たちが、いくつのかグループに分かれて軽食をとりながら雑談に耽っている。]])

    MSG([[However, every group seemed to be discussing the same topic as if rehearsed.
ただ、どのグループも示し合わせたみたいに、同じ話題を話していた。]])

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0016.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “No matter how many times I think about it, my heart still flutters—”
「何度思い出しても心がときめきますわー」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0017.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “Apparently, none of us attended the same school as that person.”
「あの方と同じ学校の出身者、誰もいないんですって」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0018.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “Ah, who on earth is she… that Battle Princess from the entrance ceremony…”
「ああ、一体何者ですの……入学式の戦姫……」]])

    MSG([[Yuriai Private Academy was currently abuzz with a certain topic.
百合愛学園内は今、とある話題で持ちきりであった。]])

    MSG([[It was about the beautiful girl who elegantly repelled a pervert at the entrance ceremony. She left school early, and because little information circulated, speculation ran rampant.
それは入学式で変質者を華麗に撃退した、美少女のこと。 学校を早退し、ろくに情報が入らないため、憶測が錯綜している。]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0019.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “No way, a fifth candidate for the ‘Four Princesses’ has appeared.”
「まさか、五人目の『四姫』候補が現れるなんて」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0020.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “Two princess candidates already from the first-year… what will become of things?”
「１年生から二人の姫候補が……一体どうなってしまいますの？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0021.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “The Hime Gal must be uneasy. Her spotlight stolen by a sudden newcomer.”
「姫ギャル様は気が気でないでしょうね。ポッと出の子に話題をとられて」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “Speaking of which... where is the Hime Gal?”
「アレ、そう言えば……姫ギャル様は？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “I heard she couldn’t attend the entrance ceremony due to her modeling work—”
「モデルのお仕事の都合で、入学式には出られないと聞きましたけど――」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //CI：リラの口元カットイン 016
    LAYER_LOAD(200,"BG025aa")
    LAYER_SCALE(200,200,200)
    LAYER_EFFECT(200, 7)
    LAYER_POSITION(200,1300,-20)
    LAYER_LOAD(201,"BUL_RIR01ia")
    LAYER_SCALE(201,150,150)
    LAYER_POSITION(201,0,300)
    SET_CUTIN_07_XL(100, 60, 35, 500, true)
    RIR_PARTICLE_02(202, "BUL_RIR01ia", 300, 300)
    RIR_PARTICLE_01(250, 0, 0, 100, 150)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0046.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
 “Kneel, you weeds.”
「跪きなさい、雑草ども」]])
    -- //リラ

PLAY_SE("SEa033.wav")
--WAIT(300)

    MSG([[In the next moment, the chatting students simultaneously dropped to their knees on the ground.
次の瞬間、談笑していた生徒たちは一斉に地面へ膝をついた。]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “Hyah!?”
「ひゃ！？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “M-my body’s moving on its own—”
「か、身体が勝手に――」]])

    RESET_CUTIN_07_01(500)
    RESET_RIR_PARTICLE(201, 250)

    -- //CI：017
LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI017a")
LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
LAYER_POSITION(55,0,-1000)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,-200,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007",1000,false)

    MSG([[Like knights standing before a queen, they bowed their heads and didn’t move.
まるで女王の御前に立った騎士たちのように、こうべを垂らしたまま動かない。]])

    MSG([[A girl dressed in flashy gal fashion calmly strode down the center of the path formed by the students attending her.
かしずく生徒たちによってできあがった一本道の中心を、ギャル風のファッションの少女が悠然と進んでいく。]])

    RESET_CUTIN_02_RIGHT(273, 500)

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG025aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒Ａ・Ｂ
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(55,0)
    LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-300)
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,-300)
    LAYER_POSITION(60,600,-300)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,255,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,-200,500,Ease.Linear)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,600,-200,500,Ease.Linear)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0026.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “Th-that person is—!?”
「あ、あの方は――！？」]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0027.wav")
    MSG([[
【Female Student】
 “The Hime Gal…!?”
「ひ、姫ギャル様……！？」]])

    MSG([[The girl clicked her tongue with an irritated expression.
少女は苛立たしげな表情でひとつ舌打ちした。]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG025ae")
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,-700,0)
    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0047.wav")
    MSG([[
【????】
※Lira serious “Hmph. Erika Ikusa, huh… be prepared. I will never yield the title of ‘Princess’ to someone like you.”
※リラ真剣 「フン。伊草エリカ、ね……覚悟しておきなさい。 アンタなんかに『姫』の称号は、絶対に譲らない」]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR01ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0048.wav")
    MSG([[
【Lira】
Wink “The one who’s going to be princess is me, Lira Hoozuki.”
ウインク
    「姫になるのはこのアタシ、鬼灯リラなんだからね」]])

    -- 16	ゲネプロ	第１章をクリアした
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(16)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)


    ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_17")

end
